participant_1.name: Jordan Smith
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and sociable, Jordan is always on the lookout for new opportunities and enjoys meeting new people.
participant_1.background: my mother is a dentist. my favourite artist is travis scott. i like playing basketball. i'm currently looking for a job preferably at a restaurant.

participant_2.name: Emily Johnson
participant_2.personality: Down-to-earth and hardworking, Emily loves the outdoors and takes pride in her work on the farm.
participant_2.background: i work my parents farms. i drive a big truck and live in country. i have a pet cow. i am an electrician.

content.text: I work at a restaurant, so i can do it.
